meanings.definition: A type of steak cut from the rib section of a cow.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served delicious ribeyes for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I grilled some ribeyes on the barbecue last night.
meanings.sent3: The ribeyes on my plate were so big, they looked like they could feed a whole family!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as juicy and satisfying as a perfectly cooked ribeye.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling ribeyes filled the air, making everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: The plural form of ribeye, referring to multiple steaks cut from the rib section of a cow.
meanings.sent1: At the butcher shop, I bought a dozen ribeyes to grill for the party.
meanings.sent2: The ribeyes at the market looked fresh and well-marbled.
meanings.sent3: When I opened the fridge, I was surprised to find a mountain of ribeyes staring back at me.
meanings.sent4: The ribeyes on the grill sizzled in unison, creating a symphony of deliciousness.
meanings.sent5: The ribeyes were stacked high on the platter, tempting everyone with their savory aroma.
